mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN BOARDTYPE T ON B.BOARD_CODE = T.BOARD_CODE LEFT JOIN BOARD_IMG I ON B.BOARD_NO = I.BOARD_NO WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND B.BOARD_CODE IN (21, 22, 23, 24, 25, 26) ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.NEWS_REPORTER, B.MEMBER_NO, TO_CHAR(B.B_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS B_CREATE_DATE, I.IMG_PATH FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN BOARD_IMG I ON (B.BOARD_NO = I.BOARD_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE BOARD_NO = ${boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_DEL_FL = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO = ${boardNo}
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, NEWS_REPORTER = #{newsReporter}, BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}, B_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_IMG (IMG_NO, IMG_PATH, IMG_RENAME, BOARD_NO, IMG_ORDER) VALUES (SEQ_IMG_NO.NEXTVAL, #{imgPath}, #{imgRename}, #{boardNo}, 0)
